definition: teacher in charge of a class
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)

sentences.english: Our head teacher has shared the cake among all the students at the party.
sentences.chinese: 我们的班主任老师在晚会上把蛋糕分给每个学生。

sentences.english: The second is XiaShi cedar fix colleague, second grade teacher in charge and biology teacher.
sentences.chinese: 柏木修二是夏实的同事，二年级的班主任兼生物教师。

sentences.english: The education among high school girl-students is an important part in the work of a teacher in charge of a class.
sentences.chinese: 中学女生工作是班主任工作的一个重要组成部分。

sentences.english: The school bell rang, and the class teacher came in without carrying any book.
sentences.chinese: 上课钟响了，班主任来了，但他并没有带书。

sentences.english: When I was an assistant teacher, I dreaded the days when the head teacher was sick.
sentences.chinese: 当我还是一名助教时，我最害怕班主任生病。

sentences.english: LinPing's being late made his headmaster disappointed.
sentences.chinese: 李平的迟到让他的班主任很失望。

sentences.english: This morning rise teacher Li seek me and say that your form master asks you to while come back.
sentences.chinese: 今早上李老师找我，说你们班主任问你什么时候回来。

sentences.english: Will the "criticism right" of the head teacher worsen the "violent education"?
sentences.chinese: 班主任的“批评权”会否加剧“暴力教育”？

sentences.english: She was a Chinese teacher and a class head-teacher.
sentences.chinese: 曾任巴蜀小学高段语文教师兼班主任。

sentences.english: Students reading newspapers during the class teacher period every Wednesday and Thursday morning.
sentences.chinese: 逢星期三及星期四的班主任时间内，同学均会阅报。

sentences.english: The head-teacher asked that the classroom (should) be cleaned right away.
sentences.chinese: 班主任要求学生们立即打扫教室。

sentences.english: Our headteacher entered a room, followed by a group of students.
sentences.chinese: 我们的班主任的后面跟着一伙学生，走进了教室。

sentences.english: Brother Bear bad- mouthed me to my master of class , I feel sad !
sentences.chinese: 熊哥在班主任面前说我坏话，我心里不得劲。

sentences.english: I rushed out of the office and found myself face to face with the headteacher.
sentences.chinese: 我冲出办公室，面对面地碰上了班主任。

sentences.english: Some students often tell lies with their headteacher.
sentences.chinese: 有些学生常常对班主任撒谎。

sentences.english: He is my middle Chinese teacher and head teacher.
sentences.chinese: 他是我的的初中语文老师兼班主任。

definition: (Tw) teacher in charge of a class/homeroom teacher
to study at the same school/fellow student/classmate/CL:位[wei4],個|个[ge4]
to go to class/to attend class/to go to teach a class
to give classes/to work as a teacher
